reviews.review:
Dead by Daylight used to be a very fun game to play with friends, or just with fellow survivors that you barely know. The killers all have unique abilities, the survivors all have unique, but powerful, perks. And that's where this game gets ruined: The constant unbalancing of both teams, the lack of developer support for the community that are actually veterans and not level 20s that want everything to be nerfed so that they can win the game. And that ties into MORE problems that I'll get into later.

     The graphics are, well, what you'd expect from this engine. The shadows are soft, the textures are sharp most of the time, and the models have detail and work put into them. The only place the engine and the graphics lack is optimization, in which when you look a certain direction you get huge lag spikes as the engine struggles to render everything in your view as fast as it can. 
      The gameplay and its mechanics are well thought out, but are lacking because of the unbalancing. In theory, this game can never be balanced; the killers are supposed to be stronger than the survivors, and the survivors are supposed to run. But when you give the survivors perks that allow them to cheaply taunt the killer, escape the killer easily and waste their time with cheap tactics, you're in for nothing but trolls. And that's exactly what most of the community is; trolls that use chat programs outside of the game, taunt the killer, use cheap tactics like pallet looping in certain areas some killers can't attack (The survivors tend to go to a pallet and sit there, waiting for you to come to the other side before they simply slide to the other side), and body block the killer, because the developers refuse to listen to the part of the community who actually have good suggestions on how to counter it. The only time I have EVER seen the developers listen to the community is for DLC. Feel free to prove me wrong there, but that's the way I see it. And that gets me into my next point: The neglect from the developers.

     When the game was in beta, it seemed like the developers gracefully took community feedback: improving bugs, nerfing and buffing perks for both the killer and for the survivor when needed. But ever since they got out of beta and released Michael Myers, which is essentially a pay-to-win killer [i]NOT BECAUSE EVERYONE JUST SAYS IT SO THE SURVIVORS CAN WIN[/i], but because of the many buffs he has compared to any of the killers when he reaches level two (Has 1/4 the terror radius, has a very slightly shortened lunge, and REGULAR speed) and level three (1 hits survivors instantly, has an INSANE lunge, has a huge terror radius and increased speed), things have never been the same. It even seems like they stopped trying to make half decent descriptions for non-DLC survivor and killer cosmetics, as they have no punctuation and poor english. [b]Never have never seen a game in my 5 years on steam go from being such an enjoyable game to a competitive faliure like this one[/b], where due to the developers' neglect of the community there is an insanely diverse and douchebag community with scummy tactics, downright cheating with no bans, and an anticheat that [b]Does NOT turn off when you quit the game and tracks your history until you close it[/b].

    Now, you might be asking: am I just being biased as hell? I have tried my best not to be, even though I mostly have played survivor. But I can tell you this: [i]Even if I was the most unbiased person in this whole community, I would still get yelled at by people on either side of the spectrum.[/i] I've been on this community for two and a half years now, and have gained quite a bit recognition for being a great survivor on multiple twitch streams (this game is full of twitch streamers), and I could not care at all what they think. Even if I was the most famous person on this entire game, I would still say that this game is just a shell of its former self. And at this point when this review was made, that's all I can suspect it will ever be as it falls into the abyss of another great game with wasted potential.

  And with that, I bid this game goodbye; for as long as I stand, even if I come back to this game eventually, I will still keep the fact in my mind that this game is not meant to be taken seriously; if they don't take us seriously, there's no point in buying this game anymore. It was already incredibly hard to come to this game as a new player when the halloween chapter came out, and now there is such a steep curve of salt on this community that no one should ever feel welcome here.
After download the update to play online with friends, the game downgradet after buging ingame. Now I can't update this to play with fiends. Thanks...

Me parece un juego increible, me encanta. Uno de los mejores juegos que juego hoy en dia. Lo unico es que en contadas veces te empareja con gente muy inferior o muy superior. Pero por lo demas es un juego increible.   ;)

A priori, na mas ver el juego en un gameplay random por tu mente sagaz se pasaría la idea de que éste es un juego sobre 4 supervivientes monguers que por cualquier tipo de circunstancia (de esas de las pelis de miedo de adolescentes que producen diarrea cerebral donde ciertos/as mancebos en vez de ir a República Dominicana a foll*r y mamarse como perros, lo que haría cualquiera con dos put*s dedos de frente, deciden ir al lago/lugar tenebroso cualquiera donde hace 20 años sucedieron unos asesinatos terribles que nunca fueron resueltos y de donde nunca regresa nadie que va) se encuentran en un lugar desconocido, con musha niebla, con unos cuantos generadores, dos puertas metálicas bastante tochas y un asesino (el del lago que siempre pilla a los adolescentes en pleno climax batalla pokemon) con bastante mala baba que quiere matarlos a todos porque nadie se ha parado nunca a ayudarle con el pokemon rojo y no puede salir de las zonas de hierba alta donde le salen chorropotrocientos rattatas de lvl 2 que no le dejan continuar la partida.
Pues si piensas que ése es el juego. ESTÁS EQUIVOCADO!!!!!.
Éste juego tiene un fondo de crítica social muuuuy interesante que ahorita relato. Porque los supuestos "supervivientes" son en realidad internos (yonkis) del Proyecto Hombre, el asesino es un segurata y el lugar desconocido es el propio centro de internamiento. Lo ves todo tan oscuro porque son recién llegados y están con el mono, la ansiedad, la dilatación anal, en fin, esas cosas que te producen el hecho de no meterte cada hora esas drojas tan divertidas que hacen del mundo un lugar mejor. Pero que mucho mejor.

El hecho es que tú y tus 3 amigos yonkos, perdón, "internos". Acabáis de llegar al centro de Proyecto Hombre y no habéis venido voluntariamente que se diga y claro, os queréis dar el piro del sitio pero YA. Más aún cuando os habéis enterado de que a las 12 hacen una Rave de la HOSTIA en la playa y el Rulas seguro que está ahi. Y si el Rulas está ahí es que se va a liar parda pardísima.
La cosa es que el segurata (the killer), no os va a dejar marcharos así por las buenas. Y el muy cabr*n ha cerrado las dos únicas salidas del centro y ha apagao los generadores para que dichas puertas se mantengan cerrás.
Vuestra misión es sencilla. Sólo tenéis que dar al botón de ON de 5 de los generadores (porque hay más) y las puertas se podrán abrir. Lo que pasa es que tras varios años de abusar de metanfetamina os ha dejado bastante jodidos mentalmente (sois retrasaos a más no poder) y no sabéis como darle al botón (suerte de que todavía podéis caminar sin defecaros encima). Por lo que tenéis que poneros a trastear con el generador hasta que, de puro milagro, le deis al ON y pongáis en marcha el generador (uno menos, felicidades adicto hijo de put*).
Si completáis dicho objetivo podréis abrir las puertas y correr libre por los campos de patatas plantadas por otros internos y seguir endrogándoos a full.
Pero claro!. Ahí anda el segurata, que cobra 250 euros de ♥♥♥♥♥♥ por trabajar 12 horas seguidas (media jornada) y tiene un contrato temporal de 3 meses pero le han dicho que si no se escapa ningún interno se lo renuevan hasta final de año. Y claro, motivación no le falta. 
Si os pilla os dará con una revista porn* enrollada que estaba leyendo (por los artículos de opinión seguramente). Pero como estáis con la ansiedad y depresión fliparéis creyendo que lleva cuchillos, o motosierras. Nada más lejos de la realidad. Si os atiza dos veces caeréis al suelo. Donde os recogerá amorosamente y os llevará a vuestro cuarto (celda). Mientras decide filosóficamente si perseguir al resto de vosotros o (por el contrario) quedarse vigilándoos hasta que os puedan los 76 sedantes que os ha metido en enemas y os durmáis.
Vustros compas podrán rescataros y haceros lavativas ultrarápidas para que sigáis en activo y tener la maquinaria a tope un rato más. Pero claro, eso depende de si son generosos o no, de si les pasasteis el canutillo u os lo fumasteis todo vosotros hasta matarlo.

Mu buen juego, te ries, te tensas, gritas y te cagas en todo asustando al gato y a tu novia cuando te pillan o te esquivan. Lo recomiendo tanto como se puede recomendar una lavativa mensual para limpieza intestinal.

How is this even out of early access?

A game where you either play a killer in the vein of Jason Voorhees, or Leatherface, hunting down survivors to sacrifice to a dark entity. What's not to like? 

Well you can play the survivors too! 

I thought I'd hate being a survivor, unable to really fight back against the relentless killer. But it's actually fun when you manage to escape or outwit the killer. It's also a great co-op game that takes on a life of its own when the skill trees of survivors and killers start to develop. 

My only gripe at the moment is the matchmaking, which can see your level 1 killer or level 1 survivor pitted against level 50s. However, even the best survivors have bad days. And in the end if you're the killer and you have a grip on them, they're dead meat!

At the moment there are only 3 killers, 4 survivors, and 3 arenas to play in. 

Each survivor develops different skillsets as the game progresses so each survivor has potential to play differently. 
Want to tear down all of the killer's hooks so he cant hang you? Pick Jake and try sabotaging the hooks. 

Want to help your teammates out with speed and teamwork? Pick  Dwight.

Want to be fast and quiet, and be a good distraction while your teammates feverishly try to fix the generators? Pick Meg!

Want to be your team's healer and caretaker when they survive a scrape with the Killer? Pick Claudette!

The killers also come in three flavors. 

The Trapper is a big, Jason Voorhees type monster that uses bear traps, sheer strength and brutality as well as fear to scare survivors into becoming prey. He's probably my favorite killer to play and definitely the toughest killer to survive. 

The Wraith is a ghostly hunter who actively hunts and roams the area looking for survivors to take down. Wraiths tend to be hard to shake once they get on your trail. 

And finally the Hillbilly rounds out the cast of killers. He has a chainsaw. That alone makes him awesome. The fact that his chainsaw will allow him to rapidly chase down survivors and take them down in one hit makes run-ins with him even deadlier than the other two killers. The downside is you can hear him coming a mile away (literally) when he revs that thing up.

The new friends play feature has been added so here's hoping you have plenty of friends to play it with. The low price point of the game helps sell it and honestly it has the quality of a bigger game studio without the EA prices. 

Recommended if you can handle the adrenaline rush of fight or flight action and horror.

Jeder soll sich bitte über folgenden Satz selbst eine Meinung vom Spiel bilden: "Solange die Überlebenden im Kreis um ein Fenster rennen, ist es für den Killer absolut unmöglich, an seine Opfer zu kommen."

Ist es ein spannendes Spiel? Ja, stellenweise schon. Und ganz selten wird es sogar richtig spannend!

Aber ist es ein gutes Spiel, mit sinnvollen Funktionen und Gameplay? Hahahahaha... NEIN!

Das Spiel ist im aktuellen Zustand, so unterhaltsam manche Matches auch sein können, ein Witz. Ein extrem schlechter Witz. Und es wird noch schlimmer (Stand 11.7., siehe unten)!

Die 4 Survivor sind übermächtig. Ja, manche werden sich wundern, aber das sind sie. Solange man selber kaum Fehler macht und man nicht von einem Mitspieler in eine schlechte Situtation gebracht wird (rennt mit dem Killer vor einem her, blockiert Wege, etc.), kann man eigentlich gar nicht verlieren, solange mindestens 2 Überlebende leben. Wenn man als Überlebender gefasst wird und man in einem Team spielt, die sich nicht für die Rettung interessieren, dann ist man immer (außer Fall oben oder wegen "technische Probleme") selber Schuld, denn...

RENNT EINFACH ZU EINEM FENSTER! Die Killer können da einen nicht kriegen! (ich empfehle YouTube-Videos von Leuten wie Dhalucard, sieht man hier perfekt). Das Balancing ist ein Witz. Ein richtig mieser Witz. Die Survivor können den Killer verarschen ohne Ende, ohne dass der Killer was dagegen machen kann. Und es wird noch besser:

Als "Gegenpart" dazu haben sich die Entwickler wohl gedacht, "tja dann rauben wir den Überlebenden einfach jegliche Kommunikationsmöglichkeiten". Funktioniert meiner Meinung nach gut, da man sich so sonst gegenseitig warnen kann. Bämm! Hat sich erledigt. Denn von nun an können Freunde miteinander im Ranked-Modus spielen, sich gegenseitig absprechen, mitteilen wo der Killer ist, wo die Motoren sind, etc. 

Der Killer hatte es bisher schwer. Wenn man gegen Überlebende spielen, die wissen was sie zu tun haben (=Fenster!) und die Maps bisschen kennen, war man nahezu chancenlos. Nun kann man es vergessen. Total.

Und das ist nicht das einzige "Problem" was das Spiel hat:

- Die Karten. 4 Orte, je 3 Karten. Hört sich gut an. Problem: Jede sieht gefühlt gleich aus. Okay, auf einer hat man ein Maisfeld, und auf den anderen hat man mal mehr, mal weniger Bäume. Aber vom Gameplay her bleibt es immer das gleiche: Irgendwas dunkles, schlecht texturiertes etwas.

- Lags. Oder Bugs, die vermutlich durch Lags erzeugt werden. Manchmal teleportiert man sich, dann kann man die Überlebenden nicht vom Boden aufheben, dann läuft man mitten in die Arme des Killers, weil der Killer sich von hinten nach vorne teleportiert hat etc...

- Balancing der Killer: Ja, selbst das ist ganz schön misslungen. Auch wenn er kein Sieggarant ist (siehe oben, dagegen ist auch er machtlos), ist der Wraith im Gegensatz zu seinen 2 Buddys weitaus einfacher zu spielen. Man ist getarnt schneller, man kann sich relativ gut an die Survivor anschleichen, etc. Während die anderen beiden Mechaniken haben, die easy gecontert werden können.

- Matchmaking: Finde ich richtig toll, in einer 4x Rank-Level 20 Gruppe gegen einen Rank-Level 5 zu spielen. Oder ich, als Killer, Rank-Level 15 gegen 4 20er, die anscheinend noch nie ein Spiel gemacht haben.

Ich könnte noch so weitermachen, hat das Spiel noch wesentlich mehr Fehler (und dabei ist es nicht mal Early Access...)

Tl:dr: Im aktuellen technischen (Gameplay-)Zustand absolut keine Kaufempfehlung! Fenster - der größte Feind eines jeden Killer...

What a total waste of time, the buggyes game i have ever played. Even notorious Alpha games are far less buggy than this final relese. The devs seem to not give a shit about their players experiance. There is no way to play online with your friends. I would expect this level of issues from a game set in Alpha but as a final relese POOR SHOW

In the deepest night, from time to time, some lights. You want to go to them, they lure you promising to show you the path. But he is there, somewhere, hunting you, waiting near the lights to take you and hang you like a pig.To slaughter you. To make you suffer. To smell your blood arround him. To kill YOU. 
Wait! Did you hear this? RUN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! yes, he`s after you! Maybe i`ll be able to outrun him. Look : a window....jump through it...he is slower at this than you! Ohh....thank god...this time was so close.... i managed to escape. Let`s find the way OUT!. Generators are running, lets run to the gate. I can see it, uhh, i esc....BANG!!!!???!!!!  
I can feel the wind and...what is this excruciating pain??? My god, it hurts!.....like hell!!! Why i can`t touch the ground?  what is this....???!!?? OMG ! He catched me!!!! ....

Enjoy the game. Worth every cent.

Now that the party-system is there I think it is time for a review.
I have about 20 hrs of gameplay, playing mostly as killer (Hillibilly to be exact but that does not matter), spending bloodpoints into various trees, completing daily rituals, burning different add-ons and offerings and aquiring perks of different raritys.
To start off this game is a slasher / hide and seek game in which 4 survivors try to repair 5 generators in order to escape the map in which the killer haunts them. It is definetly fun for both sides and best enjoyed with a full set of friends, but alone online is fun too. 
Here is a +/- list to give you an overview

+++
- different maps in which the objects are generated at random points
- "skill" trees in which you hunt the most rare and useful perks and offerings
- Now with party-system
- different killers and survivors let you choose your playstyle
- intense gameplay 
- balanced. The devs bring updates even to the smallest balance issues

---
- Sometimes crashes, although I haven´t experienced it much myself
- no tutorial and near to 0 videos make it hard to understand for beginners. Especially when trying to figure out how offerings are used and when you should burn them
- graphics. This isn´t really a negative point but its unreal engine 4 for crying out loud. But still I´m happy with it
-20$ cost. IMO it is worth but especially if you haven´t played the beta this price might keep you off buying this gem
- DC´s. Often a survivor isconnects only giving 1250 points for sacrfice and 650 points for quitting. This might be too few to give you the rank up and might leave you frustrated


Summary:
IMHO this game is worth the money. It is not enough for a 40$ game (see verwatch) but definetly worth the 20$. This game doesn´t focus on the graphics but on the balanced gameplay and the sheer fun you can have with friends or alone. And since the game is new I am sure that they will fix a lot of issues and add more killers / survivors and even maps ( They confirmed this if im right).

This game deserves a 8 / 10 in it´s genre

สนุกนะ แต่เล่นแรกๆ ลำบากหน่อย มีระบบเลเวลกับสกิล ถ้าเล่นซักเวล 20+ ก็เริ่มสบายละ แรกๆ ลำบากหน่อย แต่มันส์ ไม่แพงด้วย
ถ้าเล่น killer แรกๆ ออกจะเหนื่อยถ้าไปเจอพวก ผู้รอดชีวิตเวลสูงๆ แทบจะเลิกไล่เลยทีเดียว
วิ่งไว โดดไว มองเห็นกับดัก  <<---ผุ้รอดชีวิต(ถ้าเวลเยอะ)
มองทะลุ เดินไว สกิลไว  <----- killer(ถ้าเวลเยอะ) 
 เล่น อันไหนก็ ขอให้เจอเวลเท่าๆกันละกัน
ถ้าเพิ่งเล่นไปเจอเวล 50 ตายเถอะ โชคดี
แต่เท่าที่ผมเล่นมาเวล บางด่านผุ้รอดชีวิตมันแลดูโกงๆอยุ่ ที่โดดข้ามเยอะ มาก ไม่ต้องทำไรวิ่งวนโดดๆ จบ
ส่วนฆาตรกรผมอยากให้มันปรับให้มันเดินข้ามไวไวหน่อยนะ กว่าพี่แกจะก้าวข้ามหน้าต่างได้ มันวิ่งไป 20 เมตรละ
แต่เกมส์ก็ยังทำมาเรื่อยๆ(แมพ)(ตัวละคร) รอดูต่อไป เล่นตอนนี้ก็สนุกอยู่

ล่าสุดเล่นมา 100+ ชม. 22/9/2559

ผู้รอดชีวิต อีหนูนักวิ่ง เวล 40 

ฆาตกร เวล 30 3 ตัว

เกมสืนี้ ฆาตกร ยังเล่นยากเหมือนเดิม รู้สึกว่าเล่นคนยังง่ายกว่ามาก ที่แอบ และ Juke หลายจุดในแผนที่ ถ้าไม่เน้นช่วยเพื่อน โอกาสรอดมากกว่า 90 เปอร์เซน

ฆาตกร รุ้สึกว่า มันวิ่งอืดๆ ยังไงไม่รู้ พักหลังๆมานี้ วิ่งตามคนไม่ค่อยทัน ไม้ในแผนที่ก้เยอะเกินไป ง่ายต่อการหลบหนี

สรุปจากที่เล่นมาเยอะ แล้ว ยังไม่ค่อยมีบาลานซ์ ระหว่าง คน กับ ผี อยุ่พอสมควร( แต่ถ้าใครบอกว่าคนเล่นยาก อันนี้กากเองแล้ว 555) ยืนยันว่า ผีเล่นยากกว่าเยอะ

ปล.The nurse เป็นผีที่โหดสุดในเกมส์รองจาก Trapper (แต่นางพยาบาล ใครไม่เซียนจริงแล้วมาเล่น บอกได้เลย เดิมตามจนจบเกมส์ ทำไรไม่ได้)

Solid game. This is like the first survival mmorpg out there. The game needs a bit of polishing here and there, there are bugs and game breaking mechanics but overall its still quite solid

Some important issues that needs to be sorted out:

Infinite Juke Spots, they fixed few of them but 7 True Infinite Remains. 

What is infinite?  Well people can abuse an infinite spot to make it so they can go on a infinite loop so that the killer can't catch them. The ironic thing is that on steam forum quite alot of people actually want infinite to stay in the game. There are even topics "Infinite Jukes has to Stay" etc. 

These are:

Macmillan Estate Suffocation Pit
Macmillan Estate Ironwork of Misery
Macmillan Estate Coal Tower
Autohaven Wretched Shop
Autohaven Bus 50% Infinite
Coldwind Farm Fractual Cowshed
Coldwind Farm Rancid Abattoir

someone who is a R1 survivor made all videos to prove they are an Infinite as shown in his channel:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGuXX_ITGUIls8X7D5-Ia-Q

Other issues:

Cheaters - They do get banned by EAC, from time to time you will see ban threads on forum.

M1 Exploit to find traps - fixed

A Rank 20 can be matched against a Rank 1 Killer. Same with Rank 20 Killer gets matched against Rank 1 Survivors.

Joining a game most of the time as Survivor Killers will leave lobbies depends on a player rank, they do this because almost all Rank 1 survivors abuse Infinite spots. 

When Joining a game sometimes the lobby will glitched out and you have to alt + f4 to restart to fix the game. Not to mention you have to spam Join a lobby non stop which is extremely annoying

Killers can cherry pick his opponents and dodge any lobbies at will with a 5 second cooldown, he can do this as a Rank 1 Killer and get matched against R20 lv1 noobs by doging lobbies for 2 minutes.

Bugs and Glitches, like how as a survivor when throwing down a pellet it teleports you next to the killer instead of the other side, unable to be picked up by the killer. Unable to be killed by the Killer on the ground as long as you stand still. Being completely immune to pickup when going in a corner.

Overall despite all critism the game is still quite good and has a very good potential to be a great game. But as of now its not worth it to be honest due to massive amount of bugs, exploits and infinite spots

Besides the little bugs like game crashes and things.. the only major flaw of this game is the fact that survivors can jump through windows back and forth back and forth and avoid the killer the entire game.. annoyinggggg. I mean its ridiculous. Its fun when you got people who dont play like cowards like that but you do get the try-hards who will do that to you all game.

Respekt erstmal dafür.

Pros:
-Viele Survivor,Killer und Karten! Sehr große Vielfalt auch in der Perkauswahl..sehr viel machbar,top!
-Sound. Das Sounddesign ist unfassbar gut gestaltet!
-Grafik. Auch die Grafik ist ein echter hingucker..für ein 20€ Spiel defenitiv über dem Bereichstandart!
-Events..auch bietet dieses Spiel regelmäßige Events und neue Inhalte um es interessant zu gestalten, super gelungen.

Content.
Dieses Spiel bietet enorm vielen Content. vom Lvln der Chars..bis hin zum lösen von Herrausforderungen ist einiges dabei. Auch hier ein Battlepass...sehr gut und kreativ umgesetzt! Und auf jeden "Spielertyp" ideal angepasst.


Hinzu muss ich sagen.-..ein Multiplayer-Horrorspiel der Extra Klasse!:
Jeder Charakter (sowohl Killer als auch Survivor) haben eigene Geschichten...worauf ihre Perks basieren. Auch der Hintergrund, der Entitius, also der Grund, warum man überhaupt dort ist..ebenfalls gut getroffen und sinnig.


Alles in allem ein sehr hoher Wiederspielwert! Defenitiv die 20€ Wert.
Auch das ein oder andere DLC ist empfehlenswert..aber kein Muss..
Denn einige Chars könnt ihr auch ohne DLCs im Shop durch Ingamewährung erspielen.

Ebenfalls können über die Zeit SÄMTLICHE im Spiel vorhandenen Perks im Schrein, ebenfalls für Ingame-Währung, erworben werden.
Also hier..kein Kaufzwang! 

Auch wenn ich mir gestehen muss, dass ich niemals gedacht hätte, dass dieses Spiel nen Daumen hoch bekommt...nun..hier ist er...Grandiose Arbeit Behavior

10/7/2016: Every issue ive had with the game before has been fixed so everything said in my earliest review that was good is still the same but the devs seem to have fixed every single broken part except for graphical stuff but that doesnt matter as long as the gameplay is good.

7/12/2016: The gameplay is great and a prefect fit in the survival-horror genre, when it works.... Dead by Daylight has its ups and downs. On one side you have a fantastic game designed like a playable slasher film that requires skill and teamwork. On the other, you have bugs that cause the game to crash, infinite loading screens (They make Sonic 2006 look good...), falling through the map, killer not being able to kill a survivor (Breaks the game), Unblanced systems with two windows and the surviver being in the middle of them being able to escape the killer easily, sounds coming out of nowhere, BEING STUCK STANDING STILL AND WATCHING YOURSELF DIE WITH NO WAY TO MOVE OR GET OUT WHICH IS THE MOST FRUSTRATING THING EVER!!!! Overall at the games current state I would not reccomend buying it at 19.99, maybe if the price went down to 9.99 and the bugs were patched it would be decent... But as it is i cant reccomend it to anybody due to it being very broken. Hope this helps!! Will make a positive review once i stop crashing everytime i do anything :D

Очень хорошая игра

Dead by Daylight.....This game is great on many levels and more fun with friends, due to the commentary you can have with them, there is a few downsides though, i'll explain it below TL;DR is further below as well.

Good Shit m8:

Visuals, graphics and art are great especially for this kind of game. Most things where made in great detail and some people may contest but the grass is at a great setting, good enough for people to hide in and sometimes good enough for killer to catch you.

The gameplay itself is positive on both sides for both Killer and Survivor but that can be determined from some perks and add-ons which gives some people advantages over others (i prefer games that are equally fair). Though this downside can be small it can affect your gameplay heavily if your a Killer which leads to the bad stuffs

Bad Stuffs:

Matchmaking in DBDL can vary from same levels down to the top tier people, i myself was Rank 19 (Rank 1 is best while Rank 20 is worst) as the Killer and after getting at least 2 kills on 2 different games, i was put against a Rank 1, who 4 high level perks and i only had 1. Not exactly fair if you catch my drift. Even as the survivour if you win too many in a row you will come up with a really high level Killer, and he will kill you without a doubt, high level perks that you have never experinced can do that to you. Enough about that now on the the next bit.

How to attain Levels and Perks:

Survivor: Repair generates, escape the monster, explore basement for a long time and rescue people. Easy points easy upgrades, unless of course the hose (Killer) has bad net connection :/

Killer: Kill people....hang em high. Not as easy as it sounds specially with 4 people and only 5 generators.

You use the blood web which you use your points after each round on, this system is very unique and i like it. Finishing your blood web for your current character earns that character only a level up and a new set of items perks etc you can unlock. Same goes for the Killers.

TL;DR

Game has many positives and only few flaws, those being the terrible matching making. Leveling up system is great, has a good feel to it and looks nice. 

Thanks for reading this, hopes this helps you decide, i strongly recommend this game with a rating of 8.7/10, and dont forget to play this with your friends. Scare or save the living hell out of them.

DON'T BUY THIS GAME (YET)!!!

THIS GAME NEEDS A LOT OF IMPROVEMENT AND BALANCING!!!

I love the game... Dead by Daylight has a lot of potential, but there are a lot of problems in the game that really turns me off from playing it at all.

-THE GAME NEEDS SERVERS... peer to peer connections are problematic considering it depends solely on the lobby creator, and considering that Queing and Matchmaking are also problems in this game your basically already dead when sent into a mismatch with a killer who is half-way around the world.

-Killer-Survivor balancing... Killers already have increased movement speed and skills to hunt down survivors, but all the games I've played the killer camps the hooked survivor making it impossible to rescue someone. People will say "then just fix the generators"... people who say this are fuckers who don't know teamwork. There needs to be something added to the game to make the killer keep moving or an extreme buff to survivor if the killer camps, the moment your hooked, your as good as dead, Its frustrating because It makes waiting to get into a lobby and starting a game is longer than playing the game itself.

-Leavers... If the killer leaves the game, it should be an instant win to the survivors. Thats why I say Peer to Peer type games are problematic because if the Killer (host) leaves when Survivors are about to win, the game is considered NULL/VOID... Survivors are the ones who are affected most when there are leavers... If a Survivor leaves... now you have to fix 5 Generators instead of just 4... Leavers completely tilt the game into the Killers favor regardless of whoever leaves... IT COMPLETELY RUINS THE GAME.

If this game doesn't improve anytime soon it's going to fade out fast because of the problems.

Dopo l'hype inziale che mi aveva dato questo gioco, dopo svariate ore di gioco (34 effettive), devo dire che il gioco mi ha deluso molto perché:
-le speranze dei sopravvisuti di vincere sono QUASI impossibili, capitano le volte in cui incontri il killer che non è esperto e in quel caso vinci. Nella maggior parte dei casi il killer vince perché ammazza i sopravvisuti e aspetta che gli altri vengono a salvarli 
-Quando il killer ti scopre non hai molte possibilità perché è più veloce di te. O trovi un bancale se sei fortunato o perdi automaticamente 
-ripetuti problemi del matchmaking 
-La skill dei mostri sono largamente migliori sia per rango a cui si sbloccano sia per la loro efficacia 
-L'unica zona in cui potevi definirti salvo erano le case in mezzo alla mappa a causa delle numero finestre, ma adesso ne sono state chiuse 2 e quindi non esiste più una "safe zone"
-I programmatori (oltre ad una e-mail in cui gli descrivevo i problemi e neanche mi hanno risposto)non hanno risolto dei bug presenti nel gioco e che ne invalidano il corretto funzionamento
-A ogni inzio partita bisogna pregare tutti i santi perché il killer abbia una buona connessione sennò la partita è fottuta
-se un giocatore crasha all'inizio la partita è praticamente inutile perché in 3 è impensabile vincere.
Per questo motivo sconsiglio (nelle condizioni in cui è adesso il gioco) l'acquisto del suddetto gioco

Whilst camping in the woods I awoke to find myself trapped in a weird corn field, I wandered around for a while and found some more people. in the distance I hear a chain saw I headed over for a look, When I got to the sound there was a rather ugly chap running towards me

 “Bang” he hit me with his chainsaw and I hit the deck, he picked me up and carried me away maybe it was an accident and he was going to give me some medical attention.

 We headed for a house and down to the basement which looked to be used for hanging meat before I knew it I was on a meat hook screaming in pain I could see my new friends heading to save me, one of my new friends ran in and pulled me from the hook I was free or so I thought!

The next minute I was once again on the group and the crazed chainsaw man chased my new friend up the stairs. I began to crawl away when my new best bud was carried past me to my hook and placed upon it, I was soon after joining her on another hook things were looking bad as I spammed spacebar to stop awful spikes from driving into my body.

Within minutes two new friends joined us on the hooks 

Word of warning don’t go camping!

So. 50 hours playing this. I think its time to explain why I like this game so much.

Dead by Daylight is an asimetrical multiplayer game, where 4 "victims" need to hide from 1 "killer". The "victims" must activate a set of generators scattered through the map (randomly generated, btw) to open a set of doors and be able to escape and the "killer" must track down, hunt and get the "victims" to sacrifice them before they manage to flee.

The aesthetic of the game is amazing. Takes the bases of classic Slasher movies (the killer vs defenseless people, the meathooks, etc.) and puts them in a Lovecraft-like scenario (the fog, the pagan entity, etc.). The character's look, the map's lighting, the soundtrack, all of those thing are composed masterfully and perform a key role in both gameplay and immersion.

Are the gameplay mechanics perfect? No, probably not. Some people complain about the ranking system, some potentially "cheesable" techniques as window vaulting or the inability (for the moment) of playing with friends in ranked matches. Personaly I think that the beuty of this game is that it relies upon the inability of the survivors to communicate effectively through the game, creating a constant state of uncertainty. After all, sometimes is better to leave a teammate to die if that implies more time to advance the game objectives... You never know what the other survivors are going to do and if you should be doing something else, being a weird tense "single player" experience in a multiplayer enviroment.

At the end of the day, this game is just a hide and seek reskin. As the victim you'll need to be stealthy, control your stress at all time and be constantly vigilant. As the killer you'll have to work against the clock, thinking ahead of your preys and manipulating them through their fears and objectives.

The thrill of the hunt as its finest. The adrenaline, the fear and the euphoria of a last minute catch or escape still fill my mind after 50 hours playing!

Dead by Daylight , şimdi şöyle oyuna ilk girişte bazı pozisyonlar korkutabilir sizi sonrasında gülerek oynayacaksınız onda bir sorun yok rahat olun :D

-Rep olarak söyleyebileceklerim optimizasyon hataları var atlıyorsunuz adamda geç atlıyor vuruyor size vb vb. birde killer olursanız lobi doldurması zor e şimdi onuda nasıl halletsin adamlar herkes katil olmuyor oyunda :D 
(Bu arada bendede 10 lw killer var lobi açıp muzik dinleyince koymuyor beklemek :D )

Son olarak size perk harici verdiği şeyler tek kullanımlık itemler olabiliyor dikkatli araştırırak koyun onları loadoutunuza 

iyi oyunlar !
